errors.description: SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:1198-7826) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Discharge Medication (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35:2014-06-09) (CONF:1198-15491).

This structuredBody SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:1198-30519) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Allergies and Intolerances Section (entries optional) (V3) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6:2015-08-01) (CONF:1198-30520).

This structuredBody *SHALL NOT* contain a Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13) when either a Chief Complaint Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1) or a Reason for Visit Section (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12) is present (CONF:1198-30569).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="NEW-LOINC-CRITICALITY" Criticality (CONF:1198-32925).
